Title: 1. Choose Date & Locations
Content: Determine the date & location for your car rental. Consider factors such as your travel itinerary, pickup/drop-off locations (e.g., airport, city center), and duration of rental.

Title: 2. Pick-Up Locations
Content: Check the availability of your desired vehicle type for your chosen dates and location. Ensure that the rental rates, taxes, fees, and any additional charges.

Title: 3. Book your Car
Content: Once you've found car rental option, proceed to make a reservation. Provide the required information, including your details, driver's license, contact info, and payment details.
